channel.title: Homelab on Funky Cloud Medina
channel.description: Recent content in Homelab on Funky Cloud Medina

item.title: My humble homelab - Version 1
item.description: Like many professionals in this industry, I have a homelab. Who would need a homelab anymore with the cloud as prevalent as it is? Well, someone who specialises in private on-premises clouds and the work required to make it a hybrid cloud. And to be honest, I love it. I get to build something that is truly mine with my own constraints and requirements and still try to reach maximum usefulness for the hardware.
